description:
In this course titled 'Hypnosis - Slow Down Your Ageing With Self Hypnosis.' By Pradeep Aggarwal , you will learn -

  • The psychological reasons behind the problem of ageing
  • You will be able to manage the problem of ageing with the powerful techniques of self hypnosis, visualization, imagery and affirmations
  • You will be able to relax instantly using self hypnosis techniques
  • You will be able to reduce stress, depression , insomnia and negativity using powerful self hypnosis and affirmations

This course is a must for those who feel they are ageing are completely negative because they are unable to reduce the pain mentally and physically

It is ideal for everyone who want to slow down their ageing and improve their mental health

This course contains a lot of exercises and more than 30 minutes of live video content designed over 8 lectures in English including bonuses.

This course contains-

Lecture1:Introduction

Lecture2:Remove Myths About Self Hypnosis

Lecture3:Conscious Mind Vs Subconscious Mind

Lecture4:How To Enter Into The State Of Self Hypnosis

Lecture5:How To Master Self Hypnosis To Reprogram Your Subconscious Mind

Lecture6:Guided Visualization Exercise: To Slow Down Your Ageing

oLecture7:Summary

Lecture8:Bonus Exercise - Affirmations For Depression, Stress, Insomnia And Negativity
title: Hypnosis - Slow Down Your Ageing With Self Hypnosis
